Name: Four Winds from Heaven
Notes: Four Winds from Heaven is the ninth piece in the 11-piece Voices in Time cycle. Since 1979, Hope Lee has been studying Chinese music, medieval and classical poetry, in particular the ideology, philosophy and notation of chin (Chinese 7-string zither) music. The knowledge absorbed and material collected have integrated and become an important part of her creative voice.
Long Description: Four Winds from Heaven is the ninth piece in the 11-piece Voices in Time cycle. Since 1979, Hope Lee has been studying Chinese music, medieval and classical poetry, in particular the ideology, philosophy and notation of chin (Chinese 7-string zither) music. The knowledge absorbed and material collected have integrated and become an important part of her creative voice.
Short Description: A piece for women's choir (SSAA) by Hope Lee, part of the Voices in Time cycle.
